text: After leaving rehab in Newport Beach, Calif., less than an hour after checking in on Thursday, Lindsay Lohan admitted herself to the Betty Ford Center, according to TMZ.com. Her lawyer negotiated with court officials to change the venue of her 90 - day treatment, and the actress traveled to nearby Rancho Mirage to register as a patient. The actress spent time at the Betty Ford Center in 2010 ; however, a member of the staff ended up suing her for assault.
title: Lindsay Lohan Check Into Betty Ford After Fleeing Other Rehab Facility.
